solution_line_template: The number of Dorito bags is {total_bags_of_chips} / {doritos_fraction_denominator} = <<{total_bags_of_chips}/{doritos_fraction_denominator}={num_dorito_bags}>>{num_dorito_bags} bags
The number of Dorito bags in each pile is {num_dorito_bags} / {num_piles} = <<{num_dorito_bags}/{num_piles}={doritos_per_pile}>>{doritos_per_pile} bags
